org.sakaiproject.component.impl

Class BasicConfigurationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.component.impl.BasicConfigurationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.sakaiproject.component.api.ServerConfigurationService, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

    public class BasicConfigurationService
extends Object
implements org.sakaiproject.component.api.ServerConfigurationService, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

    BasicConfigurationService is a basic implementation of the ServerConfigurationService.

      • addConfigItem

        protected ConfigItemImpl addConfigItem(ConfigItemImpl configItem,
                           String source)
        INTERNAL Adds the config item if it does not exist OR updates it if it does
        Parameters:
        configItem - the config item
        source - the source of the update
        Returns:
        the config item if it was add or null if not (only case would be if the input was null)

      • findConfigItem

        protected ConfigItemImpl findConfigItem(String name,
                            Object defaultValue)
        INTERNAL Finds a config item by name, use this whenever retrieving the item for lookup
        Parameters:
        name - the key name for the config value
        Returns:
        the config item OR null if none exists
